metadata.title: CVE-2020-21684 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A global buffer overflow in the put_font in genpict2e.c of fig2dev 3.2.7b allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DOS) via converting a xfig file into pict2e format.

criterions.comment: fig2dev package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
